name: com.unrealbyte.easyjira
description: Easy Jira fully integrates Jira with Unity and allows you to easily implement a feedback system for your game in less than 5 minutes. Creates Jira Issues from an in-game feedback form. The asset uses basic authentication, so you can setup your user roles and allow to create issues using only the desired issue types.

samples.description: Demo Scene and Prefab for Ingame Usage
